text: The Men's 200 metre freestyle competition of the 2018 African Swimming Championships was held on 10 September 2018. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! !! Name !! Nation !! Time !! Location !! Date |- |World record||align=left|Paul Biedermann||align=left|||align=left|1:42.00||Rome||28 July 2009 |- |African record||align=left|Chad le Clos||align=left|||align=left|1:45.20||Rio de Janeiro||8 August 2016 |- |Championship record||align=left|Ahmed Mathlouthi||align=left|||align=left|1:49.90||Casablanca||13 September 2010 |} The following new records were set during this competition. {| class="wikitable" style=text-align:center |- ! Date !! Event !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
